name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a detail-oriented Senior Backend Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in **Kotlin**, **Spring Boot**, and **PostgreSQL**, delivering high-performance backend solutions tailored for the healthcare and financial sectors. My background encompasses robust software development practices, focusing on CI/CD automation and effective collaboration within cross-functional teams. I possess strong communication skills, ensuring seamless integration across various project phases.

Leveraging my expertise in cloud services such as **AWS**, I have successfully built enterprise-level applications that comply with industry regulations like HIPAA and PCI DSS. My technical arsenal includes proficiency in developing microservices and event-driven architectures, as well as aligning software development processes with product management objectives. I am adept at fostering teamwork and collaborating closely with stakeholders to enhance project outcomes.
